attributes.action: Close all schools one week earlier than planned at Xmas
attributes.additional_details: During this current lockdown teachers have been asked to keep all schools open in order to protect childrens education, and allow parents to continue working. This is taking a significant toll on the physical and mental health of these dedicated staff.  By early December they will be on their knees!! Lets ensure that teachers and other school staff know that we care about their wellbeing as well as that of the pupils they teach.
attributes.background: All schools in England (and Wales, Scotland and N. Ireland with their agreement) should close one week prior to their published date.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/549015

School closures in Scotland, Wales and Northern Ireland would be a matter for the devolved administrations, not the UK Government or House of Commons.
